AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains mapping between input port and VSQ E/F.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_TC_PG_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains TC->PG mapping per profile.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_PG_PARAMS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains PG parameters.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_CGM_DRAM_BOUND_STATE_TH
AppDB.OneLineDescription: DRAM bound state thresholds

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_PROFILE_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the profile info for each VOQ.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_SHARED_REJECT_STATUS_THR_WORDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds for setting and clearing reject status in words.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_SHARED_REJECT_STATUS_THR_SRAM_BUFFERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds for setting and clearing reject status in SRAM buffers.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_SHARED_REJECT_STATUS_THR_SRAM_PDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds on shared resources for setting and clearing reject status in SRAM PDs.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_BOUND_SRAM_WORDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to move traffic from SRAM to DRAM, per SRAM words.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_BOUND_SRAM_BUFFERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to move traffic from SRAM to DRAM, per SRAM buffers.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_BOUND_SRAM_PDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to move traffic from SRAM to DRAM, per SRAM packet descriptors.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_RECOVERY_FAIL_SRAM_WORDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to move traffic from SRAM to DRAM during recovery, per SRAM words.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_RECOVERY_FAIL_SRAM_BUFFERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to move traffic from SRAM to DRAM during recovery, per SRAM buffers.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_RECOVERY_FAIL_SRAM_PDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to move traffic from SRAM to DRAM during recovery, per SRAM packet descriptors.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_RECOVERY_SRAM_WORDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the thresholds to change the VOQ state from DRAM bound to Recovery.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_CONGESTION_NOTIFICATION_WORDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the threshold in words, above which to send congestion notification to a FIFO.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_CONGESTION_NOTIFICATION_SRAM_BUFERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the threshold in SRAM buffers, above which to send congestion notification to a FIFO.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_CONGESTION_NOTIFICATION_SRAM_PDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the threshold in SRAM PDs, above which to send congestion notification to a FIFO.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_CONGESTION_NOTIFICATION_FIFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains current report in voq congestion notification interrupt fifo

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_RATE_CLASS_DRAM_USE_MODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains the rate class DRAM usage mode: Normal (SRAM + DRAM), SRAM only or DRAM only.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_OVERRIDE_PP_PORT_WITH_REASSEMBLY_CONTEXT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains indication whether to override the PP port with reassembly context in the TM command.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_INIT_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains general ingress congestion settings required only during init.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_GLOBAL_DP_DISCARD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains minimal DP value to discard. all packets with equal or greater DP will be discarded.

AppDB.Name: LAST_ENQ_CMD_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains information for the last enqueued command.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_DP_GURANTEE_OVER_ADMIT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains DPs on which to favor guarantee over statistics admission tests.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VSQ_WORDS_REJECT_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains map of VSQ related scenarios which should cause drop based of words resource.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VSQ_SRAM_REJECT_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains map of VSQ related scenarios which should cause drop based of SRAM resources.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VOQ_GUARANTEED_RJCT_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains reject mask as function of VOQ guaranteed status.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_VSQ_GUARANTEED_RJCT_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains reject mask as function of VSQ guaranteed status.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_PORT_BASED_VSQ_RJCT_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains reject mask as function of port based VSQ parameters.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_PP_RJCT_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains reject mask as function of PP admit profile.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_DRAM_BLOCK_BITMAP_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains bitmap mask determining when VOQ enters DRAM block stats.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_DRAM_BLOCK_GLOBAL_PARAMS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains global parameters for DRAM block.

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_FIFO_SIZE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains size of TAR FIFO per traffic type (UC/ MC high/ MC low).

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_MIRROR_ON_DROP_GROUP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table sets mirorr on drop group (reject bitmap and type)

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_MIRROR_ON_DROP_AGING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table sets mirorr on drop aging time for each group type

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_CONG_MIRROR_ON_DROP_SHAPER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Controls mirror on drop total shaper (rate and burst)
